page.title: 04Blanket Bus, Ramsden.
page.content:
The Blanket Bus was a South Midlands bus that used to go to Ramsden. It was like a little maroon and cream van with twelve seats,windows and a door like a normal bus. It stopped going to Ramsden on the 15th June 1985 so all the people who lived there and couldn't walk or drive couldn't keep their dental or doctor appointments or anything else in Witney because they wouldn't be able to get there.
That was the last bus to visit Ramsden. Stopping the Blanket Bus has caused alot of problems. I bet you wouldn't walk to a far distance place from Ramsden. The people are now just stranded unless they have a car.
